name: GreyWolf TV
profile:
Welcome all to "Greywolf TV" .This Channel is dedicated to TV & Music Reactions and Reviews of some of the best TV Sci-Fi & Drama series over the last 20 years. Most of which will be series 'Ive never seen whether they be new or old. Come and take a ride along with me as we take on tens of shows that changed the way we watch both television and cinema.

If you are interested in any of these shows. Check out my Youtube Channel Playlists or for exclusive content on Patreon. 

• 12 Monkeys
• The X-Files
• The Boys*
• OZARK
• Dark Matter
• Chernobyl*
• Orphan Black*
• Person of Interest
• Life On Mars (UK Version)
